  • Reference

    Cleaned car performance dataset

    cars_data.Rd

    cars_data is a cleaned and enriched version of the classic mtcars dataset. It includes model names, factors for engine configuration, and derived performance metrics.

    cars_data

    Format

    A data frame with 32 rows and the following columns:

    model

    Car model name (character)

    mpg

    Miles per gallon (numeric)

    km_per_litre

    Fuel efficiency in km per litre (numeric)

    cyl

    Number of cylinders (factor)

    disp

    Engine displacement (cubic inches, numeric)

    hp

    Gross horsepower (numeric)

    drat

    Rear axle ratio (numeric)

    wt

    Weight of the car in 1000 lbs (numeric)

    power_to_weight

    Horsepower divided by weight (numeric)

    qsec

    1/4 mile time in seconds (numeric)

    am

    Transmission type ("Automatic" or "Manual", factor)

    gear

    Number of forward gears (factor)

    carb

    Number of carburetors (numeric)

    Source

    Originally from 1974 Motor Trend US magazine; available as mtcars in base R. Cleaned and transformed by Kunal Kapoor for ETC5523 Assignment 4.

    Details

    The dataset was derived from the built-in mtcars dataset in base R. Additional variables were engineered for interpretability:

    • km_per_litre: fuel efficiency converted from miles per gallon.

    • power_to_weight: simple performance metric (hp / wt).

    • am: relabeled transmission for readability.

    This cleaned dataset is used throughout the Shiny dashboard included in this package to explore trade-offs between fuel efficiency and engine power.

    Contents
